name: TeachMeSpanish
0:
”Alexa, start Teach Me Spanish”
”Alexa, open Teach Me Spanish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teach me spanish
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn Spanish in small 10 word chunks, with sample phrases and tests. 

Teach Me Spanish helps you to learn 2000 thousand Spanish vocabulary wherever your Alexa is and what ever you do. There are two-categories: basic, and intermediate. Every word is accompanies with sample sentence to help you to remember it.

Sample phrases are provided by Tatoeba under Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 France (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
